comment: A little buggy since the most recent android update - mic on Bluetooth headsets no longer activates. Incoming phone calls should auto mute mumble. Phone notification sounds should not play through mumble. I hope those can be fixed.... This app is worth the paid version. Despite those issues, the app is very good and I would still recommend using it.

title: Looks Good!
comment: I'm honestly very impressed by this app! It runs very smoothly and the UI is phenomenal . My only problem is that I can't hear anyone lol. I'm currently using it on my Droid X2. Apparently it's running 1.2.4, I've tried disabling Opus support but there has yet to be any significant effect. Help would be greatly appreciated! Please forgive my ignorance, as it is probably something very silly.

title: The Best Mumble Client for Android
comment: I've been trying to find a decent Mumble Client for Android for the last year, however, there is no official client provided for Android on Google Play.  Most of the apps I've tried before Plumble fall short of what the desktop client can provide.  Plumble is the only Mumble client on Android that supports OPUS.  OPUS supports on the fly audio bit rates while having higher fidelity than traditional Speex and CELT codecs.  This is pretty important for mobile users because they do not have access to a reliable connection at the best of times, and therefore a much better experience not only for mobile users but other users in the chat lobby.  A mumble server will force all users in a chat lobby to default to Speex if a client in the lobby isn't OPUS compatible so this feature to me is critical in addition to the bandwidth savings.  The UI is GREAT!  Its very clean and organized, with the ability to swipe between chat and lobby views.  The ability to enable a push to talk button and have it work anywhere outside of the app is great as well.  You can use any other app and still have access to the Push to Talk Button while you do so.  This app is superb!  10/10

title: Perfect.
comment: Exactly what I needed. Only app I found with the chat feature as well as voice. Thank you.

title: Great client

title: Everything was good until the recent update.
comment: Basically what the title says. I'll now enter a channel and then 20 seconds after no one can hear me and I can't hear them. I have to keep leaving and re-entering the server. Another messup on 7-15-14, can no longer launch app on my lg optimus. Instant crash upon launch
Hi, have you tried enabling Force TCP in Settings->General? Your issue is symptomatic of an unstable UDP link.

The interface is clean and easy to navigate, and short of admin features this client is feature rich. It's even ready for Opus which hasn't been released yet. Plumble is rock solid stable, and the voice quality is great. Very happy customer.

title: Blue tooth support
comment: Any chance in phone mode to get blue tooth added. Or some support for when a blue tooth device present it uses the headset.

title: superbe petite app
comment: rien à dire à part convaincre tout le monde de l'utiliser :-)

title: Great! Wonderful developer communication.
comment: This app works quite well indeed. I was disappointed at first by a major bug, but in under 48 hours of my review posting, that bug was eradicated (fixed)! Not long after that, a feature request of mine was acknowledged and subsequently added to the app. Service like this is simply not everday! Gotta love a developer who reads/listens to user feedback. Best Mumble app for Android, definitely.
Hi, I've added functionality to modify preferences while connected in the latest release. Thanks for your support!

title: Excellent Mumble Client
comment: Very quick, easy to navigate, looks very sleek (almost like Google Now) and Audio quality is superb. Quite possibly the best $1 I've spent. Highly recommended for anyone who uses Mumble.

title: Best Mumble App on Android!
comment: Seriously amazing, was worth the money. It functions smoothly and looks great.  Only one "bug report" for the developer: when viewing the settings, the headings seem to be falling off of the menu. Let me know if you want the screenshot of the issue!

title: Great app!!
comment: Best quality mumble app available. Others do the trick, but this app sets the bar. Already recommnded to a bunch of others. Everyone agreed its well worth the cost. Keep up the hard work!

title: Amazing design
comment: Perfectly functional.

title: Best mumble app
comment: Has all the features you miss from the free ones, and a really nice interface to boot.

title: Great app!
comment: This is probably the best app I've bought on the market. It's even better than the official desktop client. Keep it up!

title: Best looking mumble app but doesn't work for me
comment: I can only hear 1 person talking in the channel, don't think it's a problem with the app as such as the same issue occurs with all other mumble apps I have tried but I can only hear the same 1 person speak and not the others, anyone have any idea why? And yes they are talking...

title: It works like a charm.
comment: This app is everything the other mumble apps couldnt offer, dedicated developer that makes a great product and is also very helpful! Thanks again Andrew :)

title: Was perfect...
comment: Was perfect until this last update I'm thinking. Currently will go back to the server screen after trying to log into the mumble server. Doesn't work anymore. S III.

title: Best mumble app
comment: Excellent app,  no issues so far.

title: Nexus 7 + plumble = awesome experience
comment: I love this app it's better than the desktop version keep up the work well worth the money

title: Best mumble app out there, love the updates!
comment: After the latest update this app is now the best voice chat app on the market. Don't think just buy. Thanks dev.

title: Perfect
comment: Works well :)

title: If you Munble, you must have this!
comment: These guys are So on the ball! I don't normally give 5 stars, but they earned it!

title: looks well, but I have problem with muting
comment: Client is nice and works well for me, except problem with muting on my Nexus 7 w/ Jelly Bean 4.2.1 or my Galaxy S2 w/ ICS 4.0.3. After pressing mute "button" in plumble, it still broadcasts voice :(.

title: No sound
comment: People hear me fine but I don't hear them.  Same problem with the other client.  Acer iconia.

title: Awesome
comment: Supported and stable, this Dev rocks, even offers source! Keep it up.

title: Awesome
comment: Best android mumble app, hands down.

title: Almost perfect
comment: Works great, if only I was able to find a way to register... but that is one time thing, easily done from a desktop.

title: 5/5 Mumble app
comment: My very first purchase on the Google app store. This mumble app for android phones works really well, does everything needed and is much more updated than the other mumble apps. Best one out and would recommend to anyone that wants to use mumble on the go.

title: Awesome
comment: Finally an app that works great with my Attrix (the first one).  Awesome job

title: Amazing!
comment: Amazing mumble app, my dreams have come true!

title: As good as the desktop version
comment: This is by far the best mumble app on Android. Works perfectly and looks good.

title: Works perfectly on Galaxy S2
comment: The app works great. I bought it but wasn't able to use it due to the fact that the server I use has access tokens enabled. To my delight, within a week of mailing the author about this feature request the app update came down. Sexy UI too. Great job Andrew.

title: :( opus pls.....
comment: XD perfect! :\ but not compatible with latest murmur dev releases.....pls, opus plssssssss! I LOVE THIS APP!

title: Works great now!
comment: At first it kept force closing, but the new update fixed it! Excellent app! Thanks so much!

title: Force closing. edit 11/10
comment: Edit 11/10: all my issues and concerns have been addressed. This is a 5 star app.   Bought this app and did not have a chance to use it before the refund window closed. It force closes as soon as I try to connect to a server  Edit: the update has solved most of my problems. Its still not extremely stable though. It crashed a few times on me. I have faith in the dev though, he was very helpful with my last issue.

title: Awesom
comment: Love the holo look, and love that the dev is updating. Keep up the good work

title: Worked perfectly for me!
comment: This has worked perfectly first time for me with no fuss and no problems so far.

title: Great start, some small problems
comment: Great UI, 90% stable.  Needs probably slightly better control over sensitivity of voice activation (most sensitive option, not sensitive enough) and output volume configuration.  Access preferences whilst connected to a server also, as that makes it easier to tune the settings as required.  One crash for me, when wifi signal was lost. Probably needs better detection and trapping of connection state changes.

title: Needs outgoing volume control
comment: I like the app but other people on the server complain that my voice is too loud. I need the ability to reduce outgoing volume.

title: Certificate
comment: App is great! I just need help on how to create a certificate, because when I try to connect its says: Certificate is required to connect to this server.

title: Best Mobile Mumble Client
comment: This is a fantastic mumble client, very stable and has a better UI than any other mobile mumble client I have tried.  Dev is very responsive and updates often.

title: Insanely Good Mumble Client
comment: There have been a few Android based mumble clients but they've all been really janky versions with UI usability issues and themed for Android 2.3.  But this one is incredibly well planned out with a great UI, up to date theming and all of the features are perfectly functional. Cannot emphasize enough how great this app is!

title: Great improvement
comment: Its great to see that we finally have an updated android mumble client that also works surprisingly well!

title: Wonderful.
comment: Great app. However push-to-talk is actually just you hitting a button on your screen to enable open mic. :l  Please fix this. Wanted to use my camera/shutter key to talk with.

title: I AM UNBIASED
comment: I DO NOT KNOW THE DEV IN REAL LIFE STOP ACCUSING ME OF THAT.

title: Finally!
comment: I've always been annoyed that the only mumble client is old and hasn't been updated since... ever. Plumble is a vast improvement, while I would have preferred it to be free, it's totally worth what I paid for it.

title: Looks promising, but fails to connect
comment: This looks promising, but when im unable to connect it to the server.  No proper error message except for "Connection lost"  Seems like its failing because the server requires a password, but the gui wont let me enter one.

title: Excellent!
comment: One of the best solutions for on the go mumbling.
